title: Fonon Corporation releases Exclusive Laser Marking & Engraving System including Direct Drive Inverted Xyz Motion
text:
Fonon upgrades the new LaserTower™ Professional MegaCenter™ with immediate effect and includes an Oversized enclosure equipped with a direct drive inverted X-Y Linear Motor Drive system
Lake Mary, FL – Fonon Corporation, the industry leader in developing high-tech fiber and CO2 laser systems for marking, cutting, 3D printing and engraving applications, is proud to announce its New upgraded LaserTower™ Professional MegaCenter™ Laser equipment
The LaserTower™ Professional MegaCenter™ is one of the largest standard laser marking systems by Fonon Corporation including an oversized enclosure equipped with a direct drive inverted X-Y Linear Motor Drive system. The Q-Switched Fiber Laser Marking System is a safe, state-of-the-art, low-cost Direct Part Marking (DPM) alternative to laser marking with Nd:YAG and Nd:YVO4 lasers. Its ultra compact and energy-saving design competes and beats these other laser systems to become the most revolutionary, effective and profitable laser system on the market.
Primary Advantages of the Fonon Megacenter include:
 Handles various flat and oversized parts
 Ideal for circumferential marking.
 Equipped with foot switch or light curtains.
 Replaceable rotary attachment for circumferential marking
 Optional side doors for long parts
 Optional bar code scanner or CCD camera for marking quality verification
 Exhaust outlet
 Replaceable F-Theta lens for increased marking area and throughput
The LaserTower™ Professional MegaCenter™ is the most advanced laser marking system in the industry. Operating as a standalone unit or a part of an inline system the LaserTower™ Professional MegaCenter™ incorporates Q-Switched Fiber Laser with Scan Head, Industrial PC Controller, Power Supply, Marking Software and a laser safety enclosure.
Exceptional Advantages
Frame Design
Rigid, light aluminum extrusion. Excellent protection of equipment corners and rigid, stiff design for long term stability…
Skins Design
New modern 3 layer laminate: Aluminum, plastic, aluminum. Powder coated for industrial durability. Provides excellent protection for laser radiation according to CDRH requirements.
Transparent Protective Window
CDRH rated yellow transparent laser rated acrylic window for visualization of lasing processes and easier alignment.Red aiming laser beam for preliminary positioning of the marking image on the part.. view more
State-of-the-art
Air cooled, Ytterbium Fiber Laser up to 2 mJ or 200W for marking on virtually any material (metals, plastics, ceramics, etc).
Precise maintenance-free Z-axis with 4 or 8” vertical capability to accommodate the variety of lenses in one system. Field replaceable.
Precise maintenance-free Inverted Direct Drive XY Motion System
with 30” of travel, step and repeat function, 5 mkm optical encoder resolution and 10 mkm positioning accuracy.
–END–
About Fonon Corporation
Fonon Corporation is the recognized leader of industrial-grade 3D Additive and Subtractive laser-based material processing systems. Our systems are used world-wide in the semiconductor, flat panel display, automotive, aerospace, industrial, defense, electronic and medical industries with a portfolio of intellectual property, knowhow & inventions placing our company in the unique position to offer both standard 3D material processing systems or our specialty of tooling 3D laser-based transforming systems designed around the unique applications of our customers.
To learn more about Fonon Corporation, visit: fonon.us
